title: Tell me what you think needs to be done to champions you think need balancing in order to be viable.
body:
I just want to know what you guys think.

I for example want Aurelion Sol to get more for how much skill it takes to do well with him. Make his Q increase in damage the bigger it gets as well, or perhaps increase the orbiting speed of his passive the longer your W is up. Maybe even increase the radius of it as well.
